value.title: Introducing New Format Pane in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: During this video, we will talk about the new format pane in Power BI Desktop. Now we have consistent and easier formatting experience for our Power BI report. value.title: Introducing New Shapes with Customize shape formatting
value.excerpt: During this video, we will talk about newly introduced shapes in Power BI. Introducing New Shapes in Power BI with Conditional formatting.
